text_logic_form: Find the area of the regular hexagon $ABCDEFG$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the regular hexagon $ABCDEFG$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $GH$ is $5$.
line_instances: There are lines $AD$, $AF$, $CE$, $DC$, $FG$, $GE$, and $GH$, forming the regular hexagon $ABCDEFG$.
